org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport
Class ConnectionProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.accada.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport.ConnectionProperties

public class ConnectionProperties
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper class for properties related with a connection. The connection properties are determined during a handshaking process. Properties can be:

  • Message format of the incoming sender message
  • Message format of the outgoint receiver message
  • Does the host system want acknowledgements?
  • etc.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
